item.title: Fix 'Unknown Developer Error'
item.description: Installing software from different resources than the Apple AppStore usually causes a warning similar to the following: (..) cannot be opened because the developer cannot be verified (…) Using the Finder, this is easy to fix: right-click and open. The following dialog provides a warning but also contains a button to open it nonetheless. However, sometimes we need to do this from within a shell, e.g. because we installed the tool (which is a commandline tool) using a shell.
